titles.title: Impeaching Manuel L. Real, judge of the United States District Court for the Central District of California, for high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

bill.summary: 7/17/2006--Introduced. Impeaches Manuel L. Real, judge of the United States District Court for the Central District of California, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
